responsibilities: Work on performant, reliable systems that allow users to capture large amounts of data from their smart machines, sync it to the cloud service, and query it.
Design and implement data processing and querying systems, and developer-friendly APIs.
Collaborate across other teams and mentor other engineers.
Improve the experience of the data developer.
Analyze performance and scale challenges and solve them.
qualifications: Ability to design and build systems for processing, analyzing, and querying data.
Proficiency in software engineering using languages such as Golang, C/C++, Java, or Python.
Affinity for turning product requirements into straightforward, high-quality, well-tested software.
Excitement to work as a team to refine and execute the Data team’s vision.
analysis:
The job responsibilities focus on building systems for capturing, syncing, and querying large amounts of data from smart machines. The emphasis is on designing data processing and querying systems, creating developer-friendly APIs, and improving the experience for data developers. The skills required include proficiency in software engineering with languages like Golang, C/C++, Java, or Python, and the ability to design and build systems for processing and analyzing data.

There is no mention of working with Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs) in the responsibilities or skills. The focus is on data processing, querying, and system design, which are not specific to GenAI or LLMs. The job seems to be more about data engineering and software development rather than working with AI models.
